about.summary: Create beautiful and customizable tables to summarize several statistical models side-by-side. Draw coefficient plots, multi-level cross-tabs, dataset summaries, balance tables (a.k.a. "Table 1s"), and correlation matrices. This package supports dozens of statistical models, and it can produce tables in HTML, LaTeX, Word, Markdown, PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, RTF, JPG, or PNG. Tables can easily be embedded in 'Rmarkdown' or 'knitr' dynamic documents.

Create beautiful and customizable tables to summarize several statistical models side-by-side. Draw coefficient plots, multi-level cross-tabs, dataset summaries, balance tables (a.k.a. "Table 1s"), and correlation matrices. This package supports dozens of statistical models, and it can produce tables in HTML, LaTeX, Word, Markdown, PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, RTF, JPG, or PNG. Tables can easily be embedded in 'Rmarkdown' or 'knitr' dynamic documents.

name: r-modelsummary
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-modelsummary
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/modelsummary_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/modelsummary/modelsummary_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8a2e5a3e116a5bd47c698c805640fdac12e8e9d15c63101f01b405fcf269a46a

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-broom
    - r-checkmate
    - r-data.table
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-insight >=0.16.1
    - r-kableextra >=1.2.1
    - r-parameters >=0.17.0
    - r-performance
    - r-tables
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-broom
    - r-checkmate
    - r-data.table
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-insight >=0.16.1
    - r-kableextra >=1.2.1
    - r-parameters >=0.17.0
    - r-performance
    - r-tables

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('modelsummary')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('modelsummary')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Create beautiful and customizable tables to summarize several statistical models side-by-side. Draw coefficient plots, multi-level cross-tabs, dataset summaries, balance tables (a.k.a. "Table 1s"), and correlation matrices. This package supports dozens of statistical models, and it can produce tables in HTML,
    LaTeX, Word, Markdown, PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, RTF, JPG, or PNG. Tables can easily be embedded in 'Rmarkdown' or 'knitr' dynamic documents.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - izahn
    - conda-forge/r
